attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. Last 3.2TDCi New Ford in stock! Only one available. The Wildtrak is definitely a head turner and it brings a new level of comfort and refinement without compromising on the rugged capability. Great performance, smooth, the ride is superbly comfortable and the handling is excellent. Do not miss out on this deal. We will pay the best price for your trade in. Easy finance available within 3 hours. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY
